haircare.description: Cleanses hair build-up. Increases hair density. Strengthens hair. Creates shiny hair.

haircare.description: A strengthening conditioner infused with Japanese rice water to nourish, repair, guard against future breakage.

haircare.name: GISOU HAIR OIL
haircare.description: A luxurious hair oil enriched with the moisture binding Gisou Mirsalehi Honey to hydrate, boost shine, and smooth frizz and flyaways.

haircare.name: KERASTASE HAIR SERUM
haircare.description: A blend of four precious oils with a lightweight finish and versatile styling benefits to boost hair’s hydration, and shine.

haircare.name: COLOR WOW HAIR SPRAY
haircare.description: A spray that keeps straight, wavy, or curly frizz-prone hair silky, glassy, and frizz-free for days.

haircare.name: VIRTUE HAIR MASK
haircare.description: A visibly thickening, breakage-reducing, volume-boosting mask.

haircare.name: DYSON AIRWRAP

haircare.name: VIRTUE HAIR BRUSH
haircare.description: A brush that’s uniquely designed for fragile hair that bends and molds to the shape of your hand and scalp.
